# Dependency directories
node_modules/
.bower_components/

# Log files
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# Build directories
dist/
build/

# Local environment files
.env
.env.local
.env.*.local

# Editor directories and files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.suo
*.ntvs*
*.njsproj
*.sln

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Coverage reports
coverage/

# Miscellaneous
*.log
*.lock
